metadata.title: Newcomb's Wildflower Guide - Identification Traits Ontology
metadata.description: Botanical trait vocabulary derived from Newcomb's Wildflower Guide identification key, with synonyms for cross-database matching

Flower Symmetry and Parts.description: Symmetry type and number of petals or petal-like parts. Note: 'actinomorphic' (radial symmetry) and 'zygomorphic' (bilateral symmetry) describe symmetry type only, not petal count. The merosity terms (dimerous, trimerous, etc.) describe petal count only.

values.label: Irregular Flowers
values.description: Bilaterally symmetric flowers - can only be divided into mirror-image halves along one plane

values.label: 2 Regular Parts
values.description: Flowers with 2 petals or petal-like parts, radially arranged

values.label: 3 Regular Parts
values.description: Flowers with 3 petals or petal-like parts, radially arranged

values.label: 4 Regular Parts
values.description: Flowers with 4 petals or petal-like parts, radially arranged

values.label: 5 Regular Parts
values.description: Flowers with 5 petals or petal-like parts, radially arranged

values.label: 6 Regular Parts
values.description: Flowers with 6 petals or petal-like parts, radially arranged

values.label: 7 or More Regular Parts
values.description: Flowers with 7+ petals or petal-like parts, radially arranged

values.label: Parts Indistinguishable
values.description: Flower parts not clearly countable - often composite heads with many tiny florets

Growth Form.description: Overall growth habit of the plant

values.label: Wildflower
values.description: Herbaceous flowering plant - non-woody stem that dies back seasonally

values.label: Shrub
values.description: Woody plant with multiple stems from base, typically under 5m tall

values.label: Vine
values.description: Climbing or trailing plant that uses other structures for support

Leaf Arrangement.description: Pattern of leaf attachment along the stem

values.label: No Apparent Leaves
values.description: Leaves absent, highly reduced, or modified to scales

values.label: Basal Leaves Only
values.description: Leaves clustered at base of plant with no stem leaves

values.label: Alternate Leaves
values.description: One leaf per node, arranged in alternating or spiral pattern along stem

values.label: Opposite or Whorled Leaves
values.description: Two or more leaves arising from the same node

values.label: Opposite Leaves
values.description: Two leaves arising from the same node, on opposite sides of the stem

values.label: Whorled Leaves
values.description: Three or more leaves arising from the same node, arranged in a circle
